Reviews.Title: “Location, location, location”
Reviews.Author: Charlie B
Reviews.Content: whilst dirty tiny definitely 2 star standard hotel perfect location eat perfect walking distance metro floor walls curtains filthy whilst bed linen brand clean changed day bathroom fine apart sticky top toilet breakfast below average stale croissants bread croissant choc au pain bread roll jam staff extremely friendly helpful paid £120 3 nights flights easy jet luckily saving grace wouldnt recommend im paris offer

Reviews.Content: hotel placed catch train cdg gard du nord metro oberkampf corner 880 euros walked louvre champ elysees eifel tower oyu alos access metro bus nearby supermarket buy water wine etc breakfast basic bread roll croissant pain du chocolat tea coffee oj little front kitchen initally appeared luggage basic french struggle inital welcome waht numerous restaurants bars nearby offer plat du jour reasonable 125 euros average afield increases beer 7 euros glass wine 4 euros ensuite worth extra dismayed constant attention maid trying clean day arrived late wished telephone call reception treat guests waking maid access british type bars priced local unlike spain countries tend expensive

Reviews.Title: “Average rooms”
Reviews.Author: TouristNerd
Reviews.Content: stayed week location close train stations 5 minute walk hotel breakfast boring morning 2 croissants piece bread type jam family owned hotel help guests arrived late night didnt reservation fault internet site hotelclubcom vacant emergency found accommodation morning offered move luggage sightseeing

Reviews.Title: “Very good hotel for reasonable price in Paris”
Reviews.Author: tourise
Reviews.Content: returned 3 night stay hotel pleased choice hotel clean perfectly adequate bathroom shower powerful fresh towels maid service day continental breakfast included price consisted fresh roll croissant pan au chocolate orange juice pot tea coffee chocolate staff pleasant hotel short walking distance oberkampf republique metro stations sights paris walking distance pleasant stay try chez rue jeanpierre couple streets fantastic crepes reasonable price restaurant book beware found gold ring trick immigrants gold conning 3 day stay tried 5 times police blind eye

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Value For Money in the Centre of Paris!”
Reviews.Author: adrieire
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel time 9 ago single woman visiting paris time travelled stayed husband 2 children enjoyed stays hotel rates incredibly low hotel city centre paris city centre 3 metro stations walking distance staff friendly attentive facilities adequate hotel size category breakfast typical french petit dejeuner cooked breakfast buffet youre staying wrong selection hot drinks accommodating offer free wifi added plus lively weekends probably people disrupt elses sleep flaw basic inexpensive accommodation stay paris wholeheartedly recommend hotel stayed twice definitely

Reviews.Title: “Value for money”
Reviews.Author: alldon
Reviews.Content: hotel close de la republique 11e arrondissment 20 minutes walk notre dame clean tv en suite bathroom shower excellent hot water budget city hotel frills eg air conditioning slightly uncomfortable hot parisian night surrounding isnt quiet ear plugs peace quiet close restaurants metro station 5 minutes walk reception desk staffed 24 hours staff speak english rate includes breakfast usual juice croissants plentiful parking parking garage 5 minutes walk reserved paid online paris parking pass cheaper pay online garage base tourist visit paris fairly near centre pay ridiculous prices hotel adequate

Reviews.Title: “Cheap and cheerful, but bring ear plugs!”
Reviews.Author: spyderUK Posted by an OctopusTravel traveler
Reviews.Content: comfortable clean nice shower loads hot water reason bedding changing staff happy bedding carpet curtains ok little soundproofing outside world doors shut people corridor heard recommend ear plugs nights sleep breakfast basic bread roll croissant pain du chocolat coffee tea orange juice staff happy refill eat 7am 10am leave key reception time hotel reception staffed 24 hours day hotel isnt ritz doesnt pretend ritz costs ritz chose price location holiday include posh hotel dont stay youre looking crash night sampling parisian night life ideal
